title: Easy mushroom puff pastry pie
ingredients: ['1 packet puff pastry', '50g butter, melted', '425g onion, chopped', '775g portobello mushrooms, coarsely chopped', '2 tablespoons fresh thyme leaves, finely chopped', '200g cream cheese, cut into cubes, at room temperature', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 large egg yolk', '1 tablespoon milk']
